text: The 2001–02 Croatian Football Cup was the eleventh edition of Croatia's football knockout competition. Dinamo Zagreb were the defending champions, who retained the title beating Varteks in the final. ==Calendar== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" ! Round !! Main date !!
